task_completion.description: Whether the task was successfully completed or not

steps_taken.description: Number of steps taken to complete the task

correct_thoughts.description: The number of correct thoughts generated during the task

incorrect_thoughts.description: The number of incorrect thoughts generated during the task

action_success_rate.description: The rate of successful actions performed during the task

environment_adaptability.description: The ability to adapt to the changing environment and feedback

time_efficiency.description: The overall time efficiency in completing the task
